title: Something is wrong with my phone's Wi-Fi
content:
Its like my phone forgets all my home networks,when I try to connect I'm brought to an admin screen like I'm try to access the router/modem....so I try the " use network as is"and works I do have internet but it won't reconnect automatically...it doesn't even ask for my password.i know this is pretty vague but I'm not sure how best to describe it....ive rebooted and total shutdown.....correction....when I do connect now....there is no internet...
Thanks in advance.
